pages.text: What could be scarier than tax season?! This mod adds three exciting new tax events to keep you in line!$(br)$(br)Every time you mine an ore, smelt an item, or trade with a villager you will be charged a small fee.

Every 30 days the tax rate increases by 1% to a maximum of 42%!$(br)$(br)Don't forget to pay your taxes by pressing Ctrl + T to open the tax screen. If you miss a payment the In-Game Revenue Service will pay you a friendly visit to remind you.

pages.name: IRS Agent
pages.text: A friendly In-Game Revenue Service agent that will remind you to pay your taxes.$(br)
